name: Neuro-Slicer
description: A wrist-mounted blade that utilizes focused neural energy to slice through both flesh and circuitry. It leaves no trace but a faint scent of ozone.

flavor.rationale: Developed by an underground neurosurgeon, the Neuro-Slicer is designed for covert operations requiring surgical precision and minimal collateral damage. Its primary use is disabling cybernetic implants without causing lasting harm or alerting authorities to the presence of illicit hardware.
